thread.section_title: WTSmedia Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of WTSmedia | www.wtsmedia.com | 2 of 6
thread.title: Amy Shovels

author: Amy Shovels
title: Amy Shovels
text: We needed a number of pricing and packaging scenarios to be provided, and Rick worked patiently with us to determine the best and most economical options to deliver to our client. He responded quickly (even when away from the office) and accomodated us professionally. In the end, our client was happy with the product (CDs) and the custom delivery that Rick provided. And we had no question in the quality of the drop shipped product (thanks to Rick's thoroughness), without having seen it first.
